subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Saints running back Reggie Bush will not play tomorrow night in Atlanta because of a knee injury. Bush had been listed as questionable after a magnetic resonance imaging test this week indicated a partly torn left knee ligament.
snippet: Saints running back Reggie Bush will not play tomorrow night in Atlanta because of a knee injury. Bush had been listed as questionable after a magnetic resonance imaging test this week indicated a partly torn left knee ligament.
